title: Italian-made leather sneakers with monogram details
description: Sporty STORE sneakers with logo on the tongue. The men's lace-up shoes are made in Italy from fine leather and have perforated inserts. On the side is the new season's STORE monogram. An inner lining made of cognac-colored leather and the rubber outsole ensure lasting comfort.
materialInfo: Upper material: 100% cow leather, sole: 100% rubber
